results.title: Metformin and the risk of head and neck cancer: a case-control analysis.
results.text_hl: Our data suggest a protective effect of long-term @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use for @<m>DISEASE_Laryngeal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007822 @@@laryngeal cancer@@@.

results.title: Association between metformin use and improved survival in patients with laryngeal squamous cell carcinoma.
results.text_hl: The purpose of this study was to determine the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the survival of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Laryngeal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007822 @@@laryngeal cancer@@@.
